ai-snp4.15:1.3_0: I shall extol them for you,
ai-snp4.15:1.4_0: as I had taught by me.
ai-snp4.15:2.2_0: like a fish in plenty of water
ai-snp4.15:3.1_0: all the world is beaten down,
ai-snp4.15:3.3_0: When you wish to be a layman,
ai-snp4.15:4.1_0: But when blown by the wind,
ai-snp4.15:4.3_0: There’s a dart that arises in the breast,
ai-snp4.15:5.1_0: What dart has laid it low?
ai-snp4.15:5.2_0: all over the quarters and in-between,
ai-snp4.15:7.1_0: See the truth of the truth,
ai-snp4.15:10.1_0: would never delight in old age,
ai-snp4.15:10.3_0: For someone who does not tremble,
ai-snp4.15:11.1_0: I declare you the great hermit,
ai-snp4.15:11.2_0: I declare you the victor of conqueror.
ai-snp4.15:11.4_0: tied up with sensual pleasures and hard to break.
ai-snp4.15:12.2_0: a brahmin who stands on dry land,
ai-snp4.15:12.4_0: is said to be one at peace.
ai-snp4.15:13.1_0: That knowledge master, knowledge, knowledge, and conduct,
ai-snp4.15:14.1_0: One who has stored up sensual pleasures
ai-snp4.15:15.3_0: If you go to the middle,
ai-snp4.15:16.1_0: One who has no sense of ownership
ai-snp4.15:16.2_0: in the whole realm of name and form,
ai-snp4.15:16.3_0: who does not grieve for that which is lost,
ai-snp4.15:17.4_0: thinking ‘it isn’t mine’, one doesn’t grieve.
ai-snp4.15:18.3_0: I call them a net of darkness,
ai-snp4.15:19.2_0: by anyone who makes no mistakes,
ai-snp4.15:20.1_0: They agree with the in their own realm,
